title: Unwrangle
description:
Simple and reliable scrapers for data extraction from multiple pages and real-time scraping APIs. 

Why choose Unwrangle?
- No configuration required and works out of the box with platforms like Amazon, Home Depot, Yelp, Google Maps, etc. 
- Web scraping is messy, Unwrangle makes it simple and reliable 
- Simple pricing at $99 per 100k records
